attributes.action: Reduce fees for tuition and accommodation  at universities
attributes.additional_details: To reduce the fees we are paying because the quality of education is not at the standard it should be because of covid.
attributes.background: Because of another national lockdown, university students are having to pay for tuition that is mostly all online and for accommodation that we aren’t allowed to go back to now. Students are angry at the fact we are paying so much and not getting what we are supposed to

rejection.details:
Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Require universities to fully refund tuition fees for the Autumn term: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555583

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516

Reduce student loan debts by the cost of all tuition fees paid during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560953

Fees for student accommodation are a matter for individual landlords, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Enable all students to end university tenancy agreements early due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735
